parameters.query:
SELECT 
  t.tenant_id,
  t.bedrijfsnaam,
  t.ai_persona_name,
  t.ai_signature_html,
  t.annulering_toegestaan_dagen,
  t.adreswijziging_toegestaan_dagen,
  t.maximaal_extra_compensatie,
  t.retouradres,
  JSON_AGG(
    JSON_BUILD_OBJECT(
      'rule_key', COALESCE(tbr.rule_key, m.rule_key),
      'rule_name', m.rule_name,
      'rule_config', tbr.rule_config,
      'html_template', tbr.html_template,
      'category', m.category
    )
  ) AS business_rules
FROM tenants t
LEFT JOIN tenant_business_rules tbr 
  ON t.tenant_id = tbr.tenant_id
  AND tbr.is_active = true
LEFT JOIN master_business_rules m
  ON m.rule_key = tbr.rule_key
WHERE t.gmail_email = '{{ $node["Email parser"].json.tenant_email }}'
  AND t.active = true
GROUP BY t.tenant_id;

SELECT 
  ci.id,
  ci.thread_id,
  ci.message_body,
  ci.ai_response,
  ci.type,
  ci.status,
  ci.compensatie_percentage,
  ci.ladder_stap,
  ci.created_at,
  ct.total_interactions
FROM conversation_threads ct
LEFT JOIN customer_interactions ci ON ct.thread_id = ci.thread_id
WHERE ct.customer_email = '{{ $node["Email parser"].json.customer_email }}'
  AND ct.tenant_id = (
    SELECT tenant_id FROM tenants WHERE gmail_email = '{{ $node["Email parser"].json.tenant_email }}'
  )
ORDER BY ci.created_at DESC
LIMIT 10;

INSERT INTO customer_interactions (
  tenant_id,
  thread_id,
  customer_email,
  contact_count,
  message_body,
  ai_response,
  status,
  type,
  compensatie_percentage,
  ladder_stap,
  escalation_reason,
  mood_detected,
  confidence_score,
  refusal_detected,
  interpretation,
  klantnaam,
  days,
  created_at,
  metadata
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.thread_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $node["Email body cleaner"].json.customer_email || "" }}',
  {{ $json.contact_count }},
  '{{ $node["Email body cleaner"].json.email_body || "" | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.ai_response || "" | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.status || "" }}',
  '{{ $json.type || "" }}',
  COALESCE({{ $json.compensatie_percentage }}, 0),
  COALESCE({{ $json.ladder_stap }}, 1),
  {{ $json.escalation_reason ? "'" + $json.escalation_reason + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.mood_detected ? "'" + $json.mood_detected + "'" : "NULL" }},
  COALESCE({{ $json.confidence_score }}, 0),
  {{ $json.refusal_detected ? 'TRUE' : 'FALSE' }},
  {{ $json.interpretation ? "'" + $json.interpretation.replace("'", "''") + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.klantnaam ? "'" + $json.klantnaam + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.days != null ? $json.days : "NULL" }},
  NOW(),
  to_jsonb({{ $json | json }})
);

INSERT INTO conversation_threads (
  customer_email, tenant_id, thread_id, total_interactions, last_contact_date
) VALUES (
  '{{ $node["Email body cleaner"].json.customer_email }}',
  '{{ $node["Get tenant data"].json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $node["Thread ID Generator"].json.thread_id }}'::uuid,
  1,
  now()
)
ON CONFLICT (customer_email, tenant_id) DO UPDATE
SET
  total_interactions = conversation_threads.total_interactions + 1,
  last_contact_date  = now(),
  updated_at         = now()
RETURNING
  conversation_threads.thread_id,
  conversation_threads.total_interactions;

SELECT thread_id, total_interactions
FROM conversation_threads
WHERE tenant_id = '{{ $node["Get tenant data"].json.tenant_id }}'::uuid
  AND lower(customer_email) = lower('{{ $node["Email body cleaner"].json.customer_email }}')
ORDER BY last_contact_date DESC
LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO notifications (tenant_id, thread_id, type, payload, created_at)
SELECT
  '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.thread_id }}'::uuid,
  {{ $json.alert_type ? "'" + $json.alert_type + "'" : "NULL" }},
  jsonb_build_object(
    'status', '{{ $json.status }}',
    'type',   '{{ $json.type }}',
    'compensatie_percentage', COALESCE({{ $json.compensatie_percentage }}, 0),
    'ladder_stap', COALESCE({{ $json.ladder_stap }}, 1),
    'customer_email', '{{ $node["Email body cleaner"].json.customer_email }}',
    'subject', '{{ $node["Email body cleaner"].json.subject }}'
  ),
  now()
WHERE {{ $json.alert_type ? 'true' : 'false' }};
